# `IpFilter` Definition

Configuration for filtering tracking based on IP addresses.

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| ipAddress | `string` | No | IP address or CIDR range to filter (e.g. '192.168.1.0/24'). |
| name | `string` | No | Descriptive name for the IP address filter. |
